languages.text: "Простой ответ — потому что ничего не полыхает. А вообще как глава Гильдии инфернус я втянут в офицерскую рутину отчетов и обсуждений. Сейчас на повестке дня модернизация и переоборудование нескольких отсеков, и я должен проверить, что везде соблюдены противопламенные протоколы. Не сомневайтесь, как только с бумагами будет покончено, я сбегу в технические отсеки к любимому ручному труду".

"The simple answer is because nothing is on fire. As head of the Infernus Guild, I'm mired in the officers' routine of reports and discussions. There are several compartment upgrades and refurbishments on the agenda right now, and I have to make sure that fire safety protocols are followed everywhere. Rest assured, I'll scurry back to the technical bays to do manual labour as soon as all the paperwork is done."

languages.text: « Eh bien, parce que rien ne brûle, tout simplement. En qualité de chef de la guilde infernus, et comme tout officier digne de ce nom, je ne peux déroger à la routine des rapports et des discussions. Différentes améliorations et rénovations de compartiments sont à l'ordre du jour, et je dois m'assurer que les protocoles de sécurité soient respectés partout. Mais rassurez-vous ; dès que j'en aurai fini avec la paperasse, je m'empresserai de retourner du côté des baies techniques pour remettre les mains dans le cambouis. »
languages.original_text: "The simple answer is because nothing is on fire. As head of the Infernus Guild, I'm mired in the officers' routine of reports and discussions. There are several compartment upgrades and refurbishments on the agenda right now, and I have to make sure that fire safety protocols are followed everywhere. Rest assured, I'll scurry back to the technical bays to do manual labour as soon as all the paperwork is done."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, parce que rien ne brûle, tout simplement. En qualité de chef de la guilde infernus, et comme tout officier digne de ce nom, je ne peux déroger à la routine des rapports et des discussions. Différentes améliorations et rénovations de compartiments sont à l'ordre du jour, et je dois m'assurer que les protocoles de sécurité soient respectés partout. Mais rassurez-vous ; dès que j'en aurai fini avec la paperasse, je m'empresserai de retourner du côté des baies techniques pour remettre les mains dans le cambouis. »

languages.text: «La respuesta más sencilla es porque no hay nada ardiendo. Como líder del gremio de infernus, estoy metido en la rutina de informes y debates de los oficiales. Hay varias mejoras y renovaciones de compartimentos en la agenda, así que tengo que asegurarme de que todo sigue los protocolos contra incendios. No se preocupe; volveré a las bahías técnicas a realizar trabajo manual en cuanto termine con el papeleo».
languages.original_text: "The simple answer is because nothing is on fire. As head of the Infernus Guild, I'm mired in the officers' routine of reports and discussions. There are several compartment upgrades and refurbishments on the agenda right now, and I have to make sure that fire safety protocols are followed everywhere. Rest assured, I'll scurry back to the technical bays to do manual labour as soon as all the paperwork is done."

traits.locale_text: «La respuesta más sencilla es porque no hay nada ardiendo. Como líder del gremio de infernus, estoy metido en la rutina de informes y debates de los oficiales. No se preocupe; volveré a las bahías técnicas a realizar trabajo manual en cuanto termine con el papeleo».

languages.text: “最直接的答案是：因为现在没有任何区域发生火灾。身为控火行会的会长，我不得不参加军官的例行报告和讨论会议。目前，有几处舱室正在进行翻新升级工作，而我必须确保所有涉及的区域都严格遵守消防安全协议。请您放心，等所有的文书工作结束之后，我就回技术甲板忙体力活了。”
languages.original_text: "The simple answer is because nothing is on fire. As head of the Infernus Guild, I'm mired in the officers' routine of reports and discussions. There are several compartment upgrades and refurbishments on the agenda right now, and I have to make sure that fire safety protocols are followed everywhere. Rest assured, I'll scurry back to the technical bays to do manual labour as soon as all the paperwork is done."

traits.locale_text: “最直接的答案是：因为现在没有任何区域发生火灾。身为控火行会的会长，我不得不参加军官的例行报告和讨论会议。目前，有几处舱室正在进行翻新升级工作，而我必须确保所有涉及的区域都严格遵守消防安全协议。请您放心，等所有的文书工作结束之后，我就回技术甲板忙体力活了。”

languages.text: 「答えは簡単だ。炎は上がっていない。インフェルヌス・ギルドのリーダーとして、私は報告や議論といった役員たちの日課に没頭している。今、いくつかの区画のアップグレードと改修が議題に上っているが、火災安全のルールが守られていることを確認しなければならない。安心しろ。すべての事務処理が終わり次第、テクニカル・ベイに戻って肉体労働をする」
languages.original_text: "The simple answer is because nothing is on fire. As head of the Infernus Guild, I'm mired in the officers' routine of reports and discussions. There are several compartment upgrades and refurbishments on the agenda right now, and I have to make sure that fire safety protocols are followed everywhere. Rest assured, I'll scurry back to the technical bays to do manual labour as soon as all the paperwork is done."

traits.locale_text: 「答えは簡単だ。炎は上がっていない。インフェルヌス・ギルドのリーダーとして、私は報告や議論といった役員たちの日課に没頭している。今、いくつかの区画のアップグレードと改修が議題に上っているが、火災安全のルールが守られていることを確認しなければならない。安心しろ。すべての事務処理が終わり次第、テクニカル・ベイに戻って肉体労働をする」

languages.text: "Die simple Antwort lautet: Weil nichts brennt. Als Leiter der Infernus-Gilde stecke ich tief in der Routine aller Offiziere: Berichte und Gespräche. Es stehen gerade mehrere Modulumbauten und -verbesserungen auf der Tagesordnung, und ich muss sicherstellen, dass überall die Brandschutzvorgaben eingehalten werden. Ich versichere Euch, sobald der Papierkram erledigt ist, eile ich zurück in die Technikmodule, um wieder körperlicher Arbeit nachzugehen."
languages.original_text: "The simple answer is because nothing is on fire. As head of the Infernus Guild, I'm mired in the officers' routine of reports and discussions. There are several compartment upgrades and refurbishments on the agenda right now, and I have to make sure that fire safety protocols are followed everywhere. Rest assured, I'll scurry back to the technical bays to do manual labour as soon as all the paperwork is done."

traits.locale_text: "Die simple Antwort lautet: Weil nichts brennt. Als Leiter der Infernus-Gilde stecke ich tief in der Routine aller Offiziere: Berichte und Gespräche. Es stehen gerade mehrere Modulumbauten und -verbesserungen auf der Tagesordnung, und ich muss sicherstellen, dass überall die Brandschutzvorgaben eingehalten werden. Ich versichere Euch, sobald der Papierkram erledigt ist, eile ich zurück in die Technikmodule, um wieder körperlicher Arbeit nachzugehen."

languages.text: "Yanıtı basit: Çünkü hiçbir şey yanmıyor. İtfa Loncası'nın başı olarak subayların rutin raporlarına ve tartışmalarına gömülmüş durumdayım. Gündemimizde bazı kompartıman geliştirmeleri ile yenilemeleri var ve yangın güvenliği protokollerinin her yerde uygulandığından emin olmam gerek. Merak etmeyin, evrak işleri biter bitmez ağır işlere girişmek için teknik bölmelere kaçacağım."
languages.original_text: "The simple answer is because nothing is on fire. As head of the Infernus Guild, I'm mired in the officers' routine of reports and discussions. There are several compartment upgrades and refurbishments on the agenda right now, and I have to make sure that fire safety protocols are followed everywhere. Rest assured, I'll scurry back to the technical bays to do manual labour as soon as all the paperwork is done."
